729221f-a.title: Richmond: Nicholas Avenue - Hatfield Place
729221f-a.text:
Nicholas Avenue, adjoining the N.E. corner of Hatfield Place,
showing the Greek Orthodox Church of the Assunption.
March 22, 1930
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
